title: Is Chick-fil-A Offering a Free Meal Promotion for Mothers?
subtitle: A social media rumor held that new mothers or pregnant women were eligible for a free meal from Chick-fil-A, but we could only trace the promotion to one restaurant in Texas.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: New or expectant moms can receive a generous free meal from their local Chick-fil-A.
